headline.print_headline: Smoking in Big Easy Bars, Gambling Halls to End in April
headline.main: Smoking in Big Easy Bars, Gambling Halls to End in April

docs.lead_paragraph: In three months it will no longer be legal to smoke in bars and while gambling in the Big Easy.
docs.snippet: In three months it will no longer be legal to smoke in bars and while gambling in the Big Easy.

headline.print_headline: California Lawmaker Aims to Raise Smoking Age to 21
headline.main: California Lawmaker Aims to Raise Smoking Age to 21

docs.lead_paragraph: A California lawmaker introduced legislation on Thursday that aims to raise the legal smoking age to 21 from 18, his office said in a statement, just over a week after a similar move by Washington state's top lawyer.
docs.snippet: A California lawmaker introduced legislation on Thursday that aims to raise the legal smoking age to 21 from 18, his office said in a statement, just over a week after a similar move by Washington state's top lawyer.
